events.message: I received my order yesterday but the item was not what I expected, and I want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's description and keywords.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in refunds for prompt handling.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and explain what was wrong with the item you received?
My order number is 4532789. The product was completely different from the description and not usable.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We can process a full refund once you confirm you have shipped back the item.
Okay, I will send the item back by tomorrow and share the return tracking details with you.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory now. Please let us know if any further assistance is needed.
Thank you for contacting us. Your refund case is now closed. We appreciate your business and hope to serve you again.
We have sent a short survey to gather feedback about your experience with our refund process.
